:py:mod:`giveaway`
==================

.. py:module:: giveaway


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   giveaway.Giveaway



Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   giveaway.setup



.. py:class:: Giveaway(bot)

   Bases: :py:obj:`discord.ext.commands.Cog`

   The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

   A cog is a collection of commands, listeners, and optional state to
   help group commands together. More information on them can be found on
   the :ref:`ext_commands_cogs` page.

   When inheriting from this class, the options shown in :class:`CogMeta`
   are equally valid here.

   .. py:method:: get_giveaway_config(self, giveaway_id)
      :async:


   .. py:method:: display_emoji(self)
      :property:


   .. py:method:: database_class(self)
      :async:

      The database classs


   .. py:method:: create_timer_for_giveaway(self, giveaway_id, time_ends)
      :async:

      Creates the timer for the giveaway

      :param giveaway_id: Giveaway id
      :type giveaway_id: discord.Message
      :param time_ends: Time when the giveaway will end
      :type time_ends: Union[int, FutureTime]


   .. py:method:: declare_results(self)
      :async:


   .. py:method:: create_giveaway(self, ctx)
      :async:

      Allowes you to to create giveaway by answering some simple questions!


   .. py:method:: determine_winner(self, giveaway_id, bot)
      :async:

      Determines winner

      :param giveaway_id: The giveaway id
      :type giveaway_id: discord.Message
      :param bot: The bot class
      :type bot: commands.Bot
      :return: The winner details
      :rtype: Union[str, discord.Member]


   .. py:method:: giveaway_reroll(self, ctx, giveaway_id)
      :async:

      It picks out the giveaway winners
      `Note: It dosen't checks for task, It only checks for roles if specified`


   .. py:method:: giveaway_stop(self, ctx, giveaway_id)
      :async:

      Cancels the specified giveaway
      `Note: This also deletes that giveaway message`


   .. py:method:: on_raw_reaction_add(self, payload)
      :async:
